message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own something truly exceptional. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Let's start with a price of $9500.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your interest in the product, Bob. Let me see if I can accommodate your budget while still ensuring fair compensation for our product. My counteroffer is $9000.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $8250. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair compromise.
Considering your interest in the product, I propose a price of $8750. This offers a reasonable compromise between our positions while still ensuring a fair return for our product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $8500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair offer.
I understand your position, Bob. How about a price of $8250? This allows for a fair compromise, considering your budget constraints and the value you place on the product.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so my counteroffer is $8000. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair offer.
Considering your continued interest in the product, I propose a final offer of $8125. This price offers a fair compromise and ensures a reasonable return for our product.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $8000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price is a fair offer. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $10000.
